title: Fairly certain you can all relate

replies.body: It's funnier that Spongebob is shaped like the Downvote button.
It's actually Texas, but you are right, that's beautiful.
um i think we know
LightTrack is from EUW. I'm not sure how well they are taught AMERICAN geography in EUROPE.

Nordic Education system, buddy.

Very well. Haven't gotten to states yet though.

If they do not teach you that Texas is the biggest and best state, they are doing a piss-poor job, young man/woman/whateverelsethereis!

I DECLARE IT!
Let me guess..you're from Texas.
I deserted my state of birth to join the winning side.
https://image.prntscr.com/image/WmZM7Z6XRvmAOW0B5xuzew.png
Oh boy. You will probably know American geography better than half the people at my school by the end of your education.
Perhaps. I can't speak on behalf of your school.

There are the people I deem socially acceptable to continue living. For the most part they know basic geography. They aren't good at it by any means, but they aren't fucking vegetables. The problem is there are so many damn vegetables. About a quarter of the school. It feels really bad.
Can you give me any examples? Would love to hear what they'd say.

I've had two people get the capital of the state we live in wrong on multiple occasions. Also didn't know where the hell half the states belonged on a map or their capitals either. And I don't know if this really matters but only 2 of 30 in my geography class knew the number of Canadian provinces and territories (me and a Canadian kid).

Wow that's..that's just sad. My condolences.

Actually, i don't know what do you mean by "Provinces" in Canada. Can you clarify?
Canada doesn't have states. They have a system of provinces and territories instead.

I didn't know that. Very interesting. Propably because Canada is one of, if not the least geographically and politically studied places in the world for me personally. I imagine it's mostly a tundra and a couple major cities scattered near more hospitable land. Kind-of like Russia does their thing. No offense, ofcourse. I need to look into that territorial scatterment.
Hm so it is very similar. Though what i hear, the nature there is beautiful.

It is about ninety percent empty. Most people only live in the major cities with more often than not are near a body of water and close to the US border. Vancouver, Toronto, and Montreal are't terribly far from the border with the US.
That was my line of thought.  Plus I still said they made a good point; their comment was quite funny.
ya'll complain about nasus's slow but you guys all seem to forget about Zilean and his 99% 2.5 sec slow he can reset the cd on

Absolutely nothing compared to... the Special Delivery {{champion:42}} .

*shudders*
except most zileans use rewind for double bomb
why not use it for both?
The combo is E(slow) Q(bomb) W(rewind) Q. You slow so they cant escape the bombs. Then by the time the stun is over your e is back up.

Because Zilean's means I can't run away
Nasus' is I can't run away or fight back

> [{quoted}](name=invisiblecat1,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=UrTGd1qJ,comment-id=00040002,timestamp=2017-09-18T21:32:38.420+0000)
>
> Because Zilean's means I can't run away
> Nasus' is I can't run away or fight back

Well Zilean throws a double bomb on you and runs away, so you can't really fight back either.

Has to land both bombs, get within melee range as a squishy without taking any damage or getting CC'd, and has to overcome the fact that literally you will get obliterated before the first bomb hits the champion

> [{quoted}](name=invisiblecat1,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=UrTGd1qJ,comment-id=0004000200000000,timestamp=2017-09-19T00:58:15.894+0000)
>
> Has to land both bombs, get within melee range as a squishy without taking any damage or getting CC'd, and has to overcome the fact that literally you will get obliterated before the first bomb hits the champion

First he 99% slows you from ~500 range, which isn't melee.

Then he Q+reset+Q and walks away.

If you can't kill him in the half second it takes for him to do that, you're screwed.
Just dodge the wither
So much this. Works for adc auto attacks too.
dodge their cursor
You need to get a lead before they get access to their autos.

dude you such NOOOOB that cant counter such simple ability
just alt f4

> [{quoted}](name=sutora3,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=UrTGd1qJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-18T12:14:28.858+0000)
>
> dude you such NOOOOB that cant counter such simple ability
> just alt f4

They didn't get the joke
I was trying my best to make it seem like a joke
Or press Q with Garen to completely remove the wither. I mean snare, sorry.

> [{quoted}](name=Death Rex,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=UrTGd1qJ,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2017-09-18T13:46:15.216+0000)
>
> Or press Q with Garen to completely remove the wither. I mean snare, sorry.

u mean w to remove snare oops i mean wither
Jokes on you I use Mac...
Lol
Except it doesn't stop you from using movement abilities sooo nope
Wither isn't OP though.
love to play nasus, man.

Lmao. These bronzies keep crying about a negative win rate champion.

Keep it up though fellas. Y'all gta find a new circlejerk before the current one expires.
Its a joke
